extension.news: [B]3.0.X[/B] - Removed subzxyz (subtitles were moved to opensubtitles.org) - Bypassed subtitles.gr/findsubtitles.eu domain completely and removed its setting - Added support for subs4free/subs4series, podnapisi - Added boolean setting for each site supported > disable for faster searches (subs4free disabled by default) - Applied unicode ascii normalization - Added setting to sort subs by either subtitle name, source, rating, downloads - Results are now cached for two hours in order to reduce subsequent requests - Improved debug logging - Regex pattern tweaks for queries - Performance tweaks - Various other tweaks
